headline: The Whole Story with Anderson Cooper
subHeadline: MisInfoNation Part 2: Patriots, Pillows and Paper Ballots. Aired 8-9p ET

utterances.speaker: ANDERSON COOPER, CNN HOST
utterances.sentences: Welcome to THE WHOLE STORY. I'm Anderson Cooper.Since his defeat in 2020, former president Donald Trump has repeatedly and falsely claimed the election was stolen. The results somehow rigged by Democrats. There is no evidence of widespread voter fraud, but that hasn't stopped Mr. Trump and his allies from relentlessly pushing these lies. Now, many of those same allies are gathering again ready to claim fraud if the former president is once again defeated in November. CNN's Donie O'Sullivan spent the past few months with some of Trump's biggest promoters who continue to spread doubts about the security of the election and are doing whatever they can to ensure Trump wins. He begins with the most famous pillow salesman in America. (BEGIN VIDEOTAPE) DONIE O'SULLIVAN, CNN SENIOR CORRESPONDENT: How are you? My name is Donie O'Sullivan.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: OK. Tony.O'SULLIVAN: Donie.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Joni O'Sullivan?O'SULLIVAN: No. Not Joni like Joni Mitchell.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Tony?O'SULLIVAN: Donie.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Donie?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Are you an Irish boy?O'SULLIVAN: Yes.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: God bless you. So am I.O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): As a journalist, I spend most of my time traveling across the country, talking to people. UNIDENTIFIED MALE: My name is go (EXPLETIVE DELETED) yourself. O'SULLIVAN: And are you from Ohio? (Voice-over): About who they are.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: I committed to dress like a crusader, maybe five, six years ago.O'SULLIVAN: And how they see the world.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: If you tell me you're going to release the kraken, show me the freaking kraken, for crying out loud.O'SULLIVAN: JFK.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Senior.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Senior.O'SULLIVAN: As Jesus reincarnated. (Voice-over): All about trying to keep an open mind.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Biden has never been inside the White House. They are at Tyler Perry Studios in Atlanta.O'SULLIVAN: As conspiracy theories hurt regular people.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: We will get through this.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: It's caused me to lose my son.O'SULLIVAN: And lies leads to violence.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Bring in live rounds right now and shooting people.O'SULLIVAN: I think we better beyond this police line. (Voice-over): In this land of misinformation.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Get the hell out of my face.O'SULLIVAN: I'm waiting for the MyPillow guy.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: It's happening now. Other things happening now. The great replacement theory, you all know that name, right? They want to replace American citizens who love the country with people who have no love for the country.

utterances.speaker: MIKE LINDELL, MYPILLOW CEO
utterances.sentences: MyPillow sandals, $25, and for the first time ever, last time ever --O'SULLIVAN: The last time I saw Mike in person was about three years ago at his cyber symposium in South Dakota, where he said he was going to prove the 2020 election was stolen. LINDELL: There's hacks and cyberattacks every day. O'SULLIVAN: He didn't.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: So I don't need your people to go out and doctor the evidence and put out a Mike Lindell is a conspiracy theorist.O'SULLIVAN: Well, you haven't -- somehow three years later he's still doing what he's doing. I'm still doing what I'm doing. Neither of us are the better for us. I bet you this as same as this. This seems like Mike's convoy.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Hey, there's my buddy.O'SULLIVAN: Mike.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: What's going on?O'SULLIVAN: How are you doing? It's been a long time.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: What's going on? How are you doing?O'SULLIVAN: Welcome to Las Vegas. Have you just landed?

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Did you ever read my book? You know, I lived here for a while, lot of bad things.O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): We come to Las Vegas to meet the country's most famous pillow salesman.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Are you going to pay attention this time?O'SULLIVAN: I'll try. I'll try. (Voice-over): And one of the country's biggest election deniers. Mike was in town for a couple of MAGA events. The election was still seven months away but here it was all about getting Trump back into the White House.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Yes, my husband has this one.O'SULLIVAN: It felt like half tent revival.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Because we're just talking to God right now.O'SULLIVAN: Sure. Sure.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Father God, I just thank you for Donie.O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): Half Trump rally.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Where's all the media that's snaking around here? You can come right up here.O'SULLIVAN: Where it seems like everyone was selling something. Movies.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: I'm going to shamelessly plug by movie. Number one on Amazon of all DVDs. That's all on Amazon.O'SULLIVAN: And miracles.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Yes.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: You allow the cells to detox and come back into harmony with the body.O'SULLIVAN: I feel like I'm being abducted by aliens or something. (Voice-over): But Mike was here to sell more than pillows. He was on a crusade to save American democracy.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: It's Thursday, April, the year of our Lord, 2024.

utterances.speaker: AUDIENCE
utterances.sentences: Trump! Trump! Trump!

utterances.speaker: STEVE BANNON, FORMER TRUMP WHITE HOUSE STRATEGIST
utterances.sentences: With me the great Mike Lindell up here. And no, we're not going to start with an infomercial on lumpy pillows or free shipping.O'SULLIVAN: We go here.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: I think last time you interviewed me I lost my voice. Remember that?O'SULLIVAN: Yes. Back in 2021.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Yes.O'SULLIVAN: Mike, it's three years on.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Right.O'SULLIVAN: You're still doing this?

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Yes. Got to save our country, huh?O'SULLIVAN: There's a lot of people in this for cynical reasons, right? To make money, to get famous. You strike me as somebody who truly, truly believes the 2020 elections.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: You can't see I'm a grifter when I'm $40 million in, and they keep attacking my company and I'm decimated.My battle is to get the machines and get to paper ballots component. It's not about a conspiracy of overturning the 2020 election. O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): But Mike did try to overturn the 2020 election. Something he doesn't like pointed out.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: You would want it to be the best in the world when this isn't about the 2020 election, when they're going to show --O'SULLIVAN: But what am I going to learn here tonight?

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: You're going to learn that the computers that are used in our election have God keys, description keys in there. They have the pass code inside them and they're on the internet, and they're using software that was illegal and that's what the Supreme Court will see themselves.Now, don't you think the judge should at least open up and say, hey, you guys, we've got a big problem here? And it's connected to where? China. O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): It's hard to follow what Mike actually believes, but ultimately he's convinced wrongly that the 2020 election was stolen through hacked voting machines, and now he wants to get rid of them.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Tomorrow is the big day. If they pull that in, it'll be 9-0. They will vote it.O'SULLIVAN: We've met Mike a day before the Supreme Court was huge to consider a case he had funded against election officials in Arizona in an effort to get rid of voting machines there.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Are we going live on free speech?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Yes.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Yes. We're going to let you, guys, film us being live on free speech.O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): After Mike, another Trump supporters were kicked off social media platforms following January 6th for spreading election conspiracy theories.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: We're having a social media platform. It's like a YouTube- Twitter combination.O'SULLIVAN: Mike set up his own social media and video streaming platform, FrankSpeech.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: This thing over here at FrankSpeech and Lindell TV has done two things. One is gave us a platform to reach out to all of you with MyPillow products, and then also to keep our voice going.O'SULLIVAN: It's got its own slate of TV shows.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Our guest is Ben Brook, who's been on here many times. We love Ben.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Hi, Wayne. It's great to be back with you.RUDY GIULIANI, AMERICA'S MAYOR: Good evening. This is Rudy Giuliani with "The Rudy Giuliani Show."

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: I want to tell you, when we all started winning, and that was on January 7th and January 8th of 2021. A real president lost his Twitter, remember that? And so everybody that had even spoke out about the election are questioned. They were de-platformed. But since that day are voice kept getting bigger and bigger and bigger. The cause of America, my own network FrankSpeech. I said, I got to reach the public.God bless you. Thank you. God bless you. O'SULLIVAN: But Mike wasn't the only one here with an election conspiracy theory.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: The election was stolen in six battleground states. Those six states were decided by the votes of illegal aliens who came in through our open border.O'SULLIVAN: These false beliefs about the last election are being used as a pretext to cause chaos and confusion about the next election. And they've spread far beyond this room in Vegas.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Freedom! Freedom!

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: This is not a fight between Democrats versus Republicans.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Come on, come on.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: This is a fight against good and evil.O'SULLIVAN: Do you think there'll be a fair election?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: I think they're going to try and cheat.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Our voting system was always a concern.O'SULLIVAN: Are you concerned if Trump loses --

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Yes.O'SULLIVAN: -- that there'll be another January 6th?

utterances.speaker: KIM YEATER, TAKE OUR BORDER BACK
utterances.sentences: Come on. Come on. So are you live streamers? This is it, this is what it's going to take action. A body in motion tends to stay in motion. We've got to take action. Close the border.O'SULLIVAN: One of its leaders is Kim Yeater.

utterances.speaker: YEATER
utterances.sentences: We're at war and it is a spiritual war against principalities of darkness.Come on, we're appealing to heaven. Mexico, that's right.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: We're rolling down to the border to get the message through.

utterances.speaker: YEATER
utterances.sentences: Freedom! Amen, amen. Amen.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Alleluia.

utterances.speaker: YEATER
utterances.sentences: Alleluia. Father God, we come before you, God, in the name of Jesus. Father, we come before you. We love you. We praise you. We speak out to Mexico right now. We speak out to the ends of the earth right now. We pray for victory over Satan. Victory over the enemy. Let's break bread in Jesus' name.Come on. So good. O'SULLIVAN: How are you doing? I'm Donie.

utterances.speaker: YEATER
utterances.sentences: Good. Tony, great seeing you.O'SULLIVAN: Donie. Yes. (Voice-over): Kim is a life coach.

utterances.speaker: YEATER
utterances.sentences: Donie, are you a human doing or a human being?O'SULLIVAN: And now an online influencer.

utterances.speaker: YEATER
utterances.sentences: Do you see my bling?So, Mike, I've been censored in cattle.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Well, I'm going to go like this. No way.O'SULLIVAN: You really got politically involved in 2020?

utterances.speaker: YEATER
utterances.sentences: That's a great question, Donie. So I got to tell you, I am not into politics at all nor do I have an interest in politics. I'm into truth. So I can't say I got politically involved. I got truth involved.This is the Take Our Border Back North America Alliance. O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): The group's name maybe "Take Our Border Back."

utterances.speaker: YEATER
utterances.sentences: Border, border, border. We're here because of the border. O'SULLIVAN

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: What we're dealing with today is an evil oligarchy.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: It's we, the people, versus the deep state.O'SULLIVAN: Range from fighting communism.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: He told my mom, honey, they're coming for me. My mom said, what, who? The communist. Communism is here. They're not practicing it. They're enforcing it here.O'SULLIVAN: To fifth generation warfare.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Fifth generation warfare is basically anything that's non-kinetic. V2K, voice to skull technology.O'SULLIVAN: And of course elections.

utterances.speaker: YEATER
utterances.sentences: Does the ballot box matter? Does your voice being heard matter?

utterances.speaker: NOEL
utterances.sentences: They say influencer, I don't know like how true that rings.O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): Online she's known as Patriot Mom 007.

utterances.speaker: NOEL
utterances.sentences: There are some things in place for the illegals voting and being able to register in really sneaky ways.O'SULLIVAN: This idea that undocumented immigrants who are coming into the country today will vote in November's election.

utterances.speaker: NOEL
utterances.sentences: Probably. No doubt.O'SULLIVAN: When it comes in the presidential federal elections, do you think that's actually going to happen?

utterances.speaker: NOEL
utterances.sentences: I mean, I think the probability is better than not. I mean, if we're being realistic and honest about it.O'SULLIVAN: But in a meaningful way?

utterances.speaker: NOEL
utterances.sentences: Do you not think it's possible that that's going to happen? Just knowing what you do and all the --O'SULLIVAN: But they would need citizenship, though, right? To vote.

utterances.speaker: NOEL
utterances.sentences: Well, ideally, you -- well, ideally, yes. I mean, if you're following the law.O'SULLIVAN: Yes.

utterances.speaker: NOEL
utterances.sentences: But if you're already a group of people who don't follow the laws.

utterances.speaker: YEATER
utterances.sentences: That sent me into questioning, there's election fraud, period, period. There's so much evidence. You see in 2020 my vote was stolen. So that was the kind of great awakening for me to realize that my vote had been taken.O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): Kim says her interest in elections began when she claimed she went to vote in 2020 and was told someone already had voted using her identity.

utterances.speaker: YEATER
utterances.sentences: We didn't vote. We haven't voted at all. We hadn't mailed anything and nothing. And so that was the beginning of something is not right. How are they thinking that I voted? Who voted for me? We started taking our elections back.O'SULLIVAN: But Kim was given a provisional ballot and was able to cast a vote. You having the issue you had to vote in 2020, you don't necessarily know that that has anything to do with undocumented immigrants, right?

utterances.speaker: YEATER
utterances.sentences: So I personally do not know that. Now, if we're going to talk about the illegal immigrants coming in and having the ability to vote, that's a question that we all need to ask.O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): Undocumented immigrants are not allowed to vote in federal elections in the United States and multiple studies have shown it is extremely rare.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: I'm concerned about the number of illegals that are in our country that are able to vote.O'SULLIVAN: But it's a lie that's being pushed over and over and over again by MAGA influencers.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: I can't imagine how many illegals are registered to vote in a state like California.

utterances.speaker: TUCKER CARLSON, CONSERVATIVE COMMENTATOR
utterances.sentences: The U.S. code, as of right now, would allow illegal aliens to vote in the upcoming presidential election.DONALD TRUMP JUNIOR, DONALD TRUMP'S SON: We don't have to like worry about the reliable voting box. We'll just bring in 20 more million people and we'll give them Social Security. O'SULLIVAN: Some in the MAGA world like Steve Bannon have huge followings.

utterances.speaker: YEATER
utterances.sentences: War in the border.O'SULLIVAN: Others like Kim and Noel having much smaller audience but together they form part of a huge and sustained chorus of election denialism.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Middle of nowhere, hot as hell.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Vivek, how are you, my friend?O'SULLIVAN: Many of them have been shut down on major social media platforms for sharing conspiracy theories.

utterances.speaker: ALEX JONES, INFOWARS
utterances.sentences: 95 percent of it is just the Rockefeller Foundation.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Even if he's in jail, he'll get elected president.O'SULLIVAN: They're part of a new world of social media sites that promote themselves as free speech platforms.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Nick Apollo, Brian Calendar, the Hot Twins, Mr. Guns and Gear, and of course, Alex Jones.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Sleep like a baby.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Be sure to go to MyPillow.com.O'SULLIVAN: And a lot of them.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: And MyPillow is the only pillow you can buy to fight tyranny and communism.

utterances.speaker: YEATER
utterances.sentences: Sell pillows.LARA TRUMP, RNC CO-CHAIR: You can go to MyPillow.com and use promo code "Trump."

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Thank God for MyPillow.com. Promo code "frontline."

utterances.speaker: YEATER
utterances.sentences: Tap into them MyPillow complete mattress sleep system. I absolutely love Mike.O'SULLIVAN: You have a MyPillow promo code. It's Kim, right?

utterances.speaker: YEATER
utterances.sentences: It is Kim. MyPillow.com/Kim.O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): But what might have started with a problem at a polling location.

utterances.speaker: YEATER
utterances.sentences: The agenda is to depopulate.O'SULLIVAN: Seems to have dragged Kim down a rabbit hole.

utterances.speaker: YEATER
utterances.sentences: Anything with the (INAUDIBLE) is absolutely sinister, period. Now we know that Soros is just another puppet, isn't he? This was set up and this was deliberate. We somehow are losing our sovereignty and our voice is being stolen. What's really happening is there's a global agenda. So there's a global agenda being pushed. We've got to follow the money.O'SULLIVAN: Who's pushing the global agenda?

utterances.speaker: YEATER
utterances.sentences: So anti -- yes, ridiculous. I love Jews, by the way. Can I say that? I love Middle Eastern people. I love Portuguese people.I love people of every nationality, every color, every race. I just love people because we're all God's children, period. O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): Through my reporting I've met a lot of people like Kim. It's always tough to know just how much of what they are saying they really believe. I know a lot of people on the left cynically will look at you and say, she has seen a niche here to become successful in this new information ecosystem because it could potentially be lucrative.

utterances.speaker: YEATER
utterances.sentences: Can I tell you a secret? This has not been lucrative in any way. This has cost me my time. It's cost me time with family. It's cost me time even in working my own business. This has been lucrative in no way.O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): But one thing was clear.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: For all of you out there that buy products.O'SULLIVAN: Mike Lindell and his pillows. It's the MyPillow HQ. (Voice-over): Were helping keep this world of an election denialism alive.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: What can I get started for you?O'SULLIVAN: Could I get a small iced Americano?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: All right. Go ahead and (INAUDIBLE) for you at the window.O'SULLIVAN: Thank you. We're going to see the MyPillow guy.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: MyPillow guy?O'SULLIVAN: Yes.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: That sounds like a lot of fun.O'SULLIVAN: I know. Does he come by for coffee?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Probably all the time.O'SULLIVAN: We'll just head on in. Hello. How are you? We're here to see Mike. Wow. Mike is thinking about how bad this interview could go, but just bought a gun on his desk so. Uh-oh. How are you?

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Good. Good. How are you guys?O'SULLIVAN: Good to see you.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Good to see you.O'SULLIVAN: Just admiring your --

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: I don't usually work here. Here's (INAUDIBLE), everybody comes in.O'SULLIVAN: No problem.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Got a couple of things we've got to do and then we'll be heading down there.O'SULLIVAN: When we visited Mike the first item on his agenda was a call about a company that would help him navigate big tech's rules against misinformation, allowing him to promote his platform FrankSpeech.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: The good thing is the number one thing is FrankSpeech platform because it all centers around that. If you -- if I have a voice, I can pretty much guide anything, you know, anywhere. But if I don't have my voice, which is why I made FrankSpeech in the first place.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Our goal is to get you on these platforms, getting views without getting taken down. And it's a constant, constant battle.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: And you're making awareness for the platform FrankSpeech, correct?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: That's correct.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: That's it. There you go. You're hired. OK.O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): Mike Lindell is an American success story. LINDELL: Fitting you with a MyPillow is very important so that you get the right amount of fill for you as an individual. O'SULLIVAN: He went from crack addict.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: You know, that hologram, that picture there, is where the drug dealers did an intervention on me in 2008.O'SULLIVAN: Your drug dealers --

utterances.speaker: LINDEL
utterances.sentences: They're doing an intervention.O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): To CEO.

utterances.speaker: LINDEL
utterances.sentences: Hello. Hello, hello. Hello, hello. So when they stack these up and she's looking for any flaws, this is the first part of customer -- of making sure everything is perfect. There's Dick. He's in the book.Dick, CNN is here. They want to interview you. O'SULLIVAN: He's given jobs to people who've suffered from addiction like he did.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: He was my kind of hope badge. He had been clean and sober for three years when he came to me the month before I quit everything. Here's my original invention. You see this thing with the round holes?O'SULLIVAN: Yes.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: I had to change that out three times to get the different sizes I need when I invented MyPillow. This is how I did my shows back in the days. So I would sit there. If you came to me.O'SULLIVAN: But I sleep like this, snoring like.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Right. So you --O'SULLIVAN: And get sore --

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Right. Your arm gets sore. You don't need that with the MyPillow because this -- what's happening is your pillow is going, and your body wants to keep your neck straight.DONALD TRUMP (R), PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATE: It's good to see you here. O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): It's hard to imagine now.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: It all seems like a lifetime ago that we met in August of 2016, right?O'SULLIVAN: But until a few years ago, Mike had no interest in politics.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: He invited me to Trump Tower and I walked out of his office about 40 minutes later. I said, I don't know what a president -- I had never voted before in my life. O'SULLIVAN

utterances.speaker: LINDEL
utterances.sentences: I had never been -- I didn't know, I was a crack guy. I didn't know a Republican from a Democrat, I didn't know what a filibuster from a millibar.O'SULLIVAN: So you never voted before 2016?

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: No. My whole life I didn't think politics affected me at all. And one of the things that you've shown us all is that it affects almost everything in our lives, yes, politics do.Normally if you've seen this -- O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): But his belief in election conspiracy theories and his insistence on pursuing them has almost cost him his business. And the box stores and stuff kicked you out after January 2021?

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: January 9th when I got all the evidence.O'SULLIVAN: But do you realize what you're doing when it comes to elections it risks all of this. Right? Like --

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: The world has risks all that, but I can't risk our country. I won't back down.O'SULLIVAN: There's no room for you to say, you know what, just go back. Focus on Pillows.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: So this machine. I took it only one thing. Everything we've sent out has a bible verse in it.O'SULLIVAN: Wait. So this is custom-made. You get a bible --

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Custom-made. Yes, to put a bible verse in every single package that goes out of here.O'SULLIVAN: What? Notice to become Christians become new persons. That's too --

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Second Corinthians --O'SULLIVAN: As Trump would say two Corinthians.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Yes, yes. Right. So what you see, see that willy-wonk (PH) and truck factory back there. O'SULLIVAN(Voice-over): I stepped into Mike Lindell's factory into his world. What? Oh, my god. Those are robots.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: These are -- what they do.O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): But the more I spoke to him. Do you have evidence it was stolen?

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: In 2020?O'SULLIVAN: Yes.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Absolutely. Evidence we have is the cash vault records.O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): The more it was clear when it came to elections that his was a world of pure imagination.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Look at that guy.O'SULLIVAN: You seem to -- I think it's two different things, right? You can say there's issues with voting machines, et cetera. But you don't have to say -- go as far as saying that the 2020 election was stolen.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: I have never -- for me, I haven't said -- you guys have been the ones saying that. I've said that in the beginning, yes, it was stolen. I know it was stolen. I have evidence it was stolen. We got to secure election platform and learn from that. I don't care if it was completely turned over or not. We've got a big problem here.O'SULLIVAN: I understand. Yes.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Where computers are in our elections.O'SULLIVAN: Did you have a good night? (Voice-over): When we last saw Mike in Vegas.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: That's what you're going to learn. That's what the Supreme Court will see themselves.O'SULLIVAN: He was confident that a case he had help bring to the Supreme Court challenging the use of election machines in Arizona would be accepted by all nine Supreme Court justices.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: And I'm telling you it's going to be a 9-0 vote going wild.O'SULLIVAN: In the end, the court refused to even hear the case. But Mike wasn't fazed or at least he didn't act like he was.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Our victories everybody, these are our little victories, which are big victories. People see, oh, Mike, you Supreme Court got turned down. How do you feel? I feel great.O'SULLIVAN: All right. So how are you doing now? Are you going on with Bannon?

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Yes. Hey, Denver.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Hi, sir, how are you today?

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Not too bad. Not too bad. We'll do this. The giveaway, the flag, and the MyPillow 2.0.O'SULLIVAN: You're doing a promo on Bannon, too.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: This one -- yes. You know, we buy advertising all over, podcast everywhere.O'SULLIVAN: How many shows like Bannon's are you on?

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Like podcasts?O'SULLIVAN: Yes.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Most of all them there's -- I don't know. I guess 100 to 200, but when we had this long before this election. So.O'SULLIVAN: Any kind of pro-Trump MAGA media I see? I always see a MyPillow ad on there.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: This country will be saved,

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: War Room. Here's your host, Stephen K. Bannon.

utterances.speaker: BANNON
utterances.sentences: Afternoon, Neil, formerly a Trump administration one. You're selling the best beef in the world. Where do people go?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: You go to Merryweather --

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: She's doing beef right now.

utterances.speaker: BANNON
utterances.sentences: Mike Lindell, people's heads have been blown up about this deal. Talk to me, give me a deal before I go to the 6

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: All right. And now it seemed we had a great day with CNN. Remember they toured the factory, everybody. So we did, you guys get the free go anywhere MyPillow. And the MyPillow 2.0. Free with any purchase, as we know, we all need the best sleep of our lives during these attacks.Steve, it's been quite a day with these CNN guys. I got 20 cameras on me right now.

utterances.speaker: BANNON
utterances.sentences: Is this Donie? Is this our friend from CNN, Donie, the Irishman?

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: He's right here. BANNONthing. He's an assassin. Watch out for him. He's a killer. Watch that guy.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Yes. OK.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: I want to thank God for his big mercy on our nation. And thank God for protecting President Donald Trump yesterday.O'SULLIVAN: Where were you when you heard the news last night?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: I was at home sitting on my couch, and I was devastated by what I saw. I couldn't believe my eyes. I mean, this is America.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: They almost just killed our president. They almost just murdered him.O'SULLIVAN: We are at the Republican National Convention in Milwaukee. Trump was almost just assassinated. It's the first attempted assassination of a U.S. president in the age of social media.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: I am here to protest Trump in a swing state where it matters even more.O'SULLIVAN: And is there a number one issue for you or?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Yes, definitely women's rights, abortion laws.O'SULLIVAN: How did you feel when you saw he almost got assassinated?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: I didn't feel too passionately in either direction. I think bad things happen to bad people.O'SULLIVAN: How did you feel when you saw the assassination attempt?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Do you really want to know?O'SULLIVAN: Yes.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: The first thing that ran through my head is because we cannot believe this man ever that it was somehow fate. No, that a man died. It's horrid. And I think it is a terrible comment on the country's state right now that any one would think anywhere that it's appropriate to shoot at any political candidate. But I couldn't help but wonder because we've been lied to over and over by this man.O'SULLIVAN: I assume just as you've watched what Trump supporters say about the election or how January 6th, was Black Lives Matter an inside job? Now, you kind of sound like them. You're saying, well, maybe it was a staged assassination attempt.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Right. And that's I hate but that's what I'm doing. I hate that that's where I have gone. And I wonder why I've gone there and is it because I am constantly hearing them say these kind of things? I don't like that this is where we've gotten in this country because there has been this pervasive and it has come mainly from Trump and his supporters. This pervasive misinformation that has become a part of our country.O'SULLIVAN: People like Mary don't really know what to believe in part because of how fractured our media environment has become, and that brings us here to Media Row.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: I've been against political violence and I hate what happened to Trump.O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): Real Americas' Voice, Daily Signal, FrankSpeech. These are all media outlets that most Americans have never heard of but it's where hundreds of thousands, millions of people are getting more and more of their news, their information and misinformation. BEN BERGQUAM, REAL AMERICA'S VOICE: We exist because you guys are doing such a poor job. Our network and I would say others are kind of filling the vacuum that the mainstream media, fake news media. We're leaving. O'SULLIVAN: Don Junior from the Trump campaign realizes just how important this new media universe is, right? He is going from booth to booth here, doing interviews, because this is where the audience is. Would you agree?

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: Hey, I'm going to tell you something because you're right. You know what, let me tell you something.O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): I had barely stepped foot in Media Row before running into Mike Lindell.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: I mean, at these stations, people that got their voice taken away. They started podcasts. They started all these news things rose up. O'SULLIVANSteve Bannon Show. But since we last met Mike, Bannon had gone to jail and his daughter had taken over hosting.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Mike, I know my dad who said in order to support him, support our sponsors.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: I promise your dad, when he went in, this is our political prisoner special, exclusive to the "War Room." This is the most affordable mattress topper in history.O'SULLIVAN: Trump's assassination attempt injected this year's RNC with a new sense of urgency. But not without a sense of humor.

utterances.speaker: RUSSELL BRAND, COMEDIAN
utterances.sentences: I've never been to anything like this. This is somewhere between a con hall and a trade fair. And I'm so confused.O'SULLIVAN: What is Trump Poetry?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: It's the greatest poetry book of all time written by the greatest poet of our generation. It is his tweets 2009 to 2019 as concrete poetry in the style of E. Cummings.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: I am a defender of Miley Cyrus, who I think is a good person, not because she stays at, let's say, my hotel, but last night's outfit must go.O'SULLIVAN: Are you working here? You're buying.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: I'm buying.O'SULLIVAN: What are you buying?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: I'm buying Lee Greenwood's bible. I want Trump to sign it and Lee Greenwood, $75.O'SULLIVAN: Tree books.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: 25. What do you think? Should I get it?O'SULLIVAN: I think you should.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Well.O'SULLIVAN: What's Patriot Mobile?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: What are we?O'SULLIVAN: Yes.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: We're America's only Christian conservative wireless provider.O'SULLIVAN: Patriots only? Patriot Mobile because you do not want to be with one of those liberal toll networks, all right? (Voice-over): But it made the carnival atmosphere talk of a dark future.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Well, yes.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: There's no question it's a huge issue.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Now only United States citizens should be voting in America.O'SULLIVAN: But they're not going to get a ballot, though, will they? They won't be on a voter rolls.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: They'll be able to go up to any clerk and ask to claim that they're a last-minute registrant and vote.O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): The conspiracy theories spewed here in Media Row are the same being preached from the podium at the main stage of the RNC. REP. STEVE SCALISE (R-LA): Biden and Harris want illegals to vote now that they've opened up the border.

utterances.speaker: LAURIE CANTILLO, CHAIR, HUMANE BORDERS
utterances.sentences: I think what we're seeing now is that the border has become even more politicized than ever.O'SULLIVAN: So many of these narratives emerge at the southern border so we went there to find the facts.

utterances.speaker: CANTILLO
utterances.sentences: We have these flags, they're 30 feet high so that they can be seen for several miles. The blue is the universal symbol of water.O'SULLIVAN: Humane Borders is a charity that gives water to migrants crossing the U.S.-Mexican border. You've been doing this more than 20 years?

utterances.speaker: CANTILLO
utterances.sentences: Humane Borders was founded in the year 2000. If you look statistically at who's coming in through the border, immigrants are much less likely to commit crimes than U.S. born citizens.O'SULLIVAN: The MAGA media universe once portrayed the border in one way.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: This, you're like, OK, what's the blue flag, guys? What's the blue flag? We've got water stations now. This is set up here before illegal.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: These are military aged men like they're in their 20s, man, and they're not coming here with families.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Are going to vote for Joe Biden? Yes, OK. They're all going to vote for Joe Biden. You did it, Joe.

utterances.speaker: CANTILLO
utterances.sentences: These are political opportunists who are coming to the border for a photo-op to try to convince people that this is a scary place.O'SULLIVAN: As we travelled along the border, we suddenly came upon a group that had just crossed into the U.S. Mostly children and women, some pregnant, waiting in 100-degree heat.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: OK? It's OK.

utterances.speaker: DORA RODRIGUEZ, BOARD MEMBER, HUMANE BORDERS
utterances.sentences: They (INAUDIBLE) them to the side because they're going to get really pissed off.O'SULLIVAN: Border Patrol eventually arrived.

utterances.speaker: RODRIGUEZ
utterances.sentences: (Speaking in foreign language)O'SULLIVAN: This group would be taken in to be processed and within 24 hours, some of them could be sent back to Mexico. Further down the wall migrants sat in a makeshift camp waiting to be picked up by Border Patrol.

utterances.speaker: RODRIGUEZ
utterances.sentences: Hi, honey. How are you? So do you know what's going to happen when they come to pick you up? I need asylum. (Speaking in foreign language). OK?O'SULLIVAN: Some here were the so-called military age men Trump world keeps talking about.

utterances.speaker: RODRIGUEZ
utterances.sentences: When the agent come, you say, we want asylum. You have a right to be here and ask for asylum.O'SULLIVAN: Dora Rodriguez fled El Salvador and crossed the border into the United States in 1980.

utterances.speaker: BILL GATES, MARICOPA COUNTY, ARIZONA BOARD OF SUPERVISORS
utterances.sentences: It is. It is. It is true.STEPHEN RICHER (R), MARICOPA COUNTY, ARIZONA RECORDER: Nobody ever just says, you should trust electronics because you should just trust them. So this is an important step before the election to make sure that the tabulators are working as intended. O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): We were in Maricopa as the county tested its machines that count votes. Representatives from both political parties were here to witness it for themselves.

utterances.speaker: RICHER
utterances.sentences: And then there are tests after the election as well to make sure that the tabulator stayed consistent and were reading ballots as they should.O'SULLIVAN: Tests like these happen all over the country. But they seem to do little to quell conspiracy theories about voting machines.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: I don't trust any election that was ever used with the computer ever. I want to get to paper ballots and hand count it.

utterances.speaker: GATES
utterances.sentences: Everyone votes on paper here. So this is part of these conspiracy theories that people are voting, you know, like touchscreen, like they're ordering a burger at McDonald's. It's on paper and the paper ballots go through the machines. That's how they're tabulated. But also keep in mind that we do several audits and one of them is a hand count, a percentage of those votes to make sure that the hand count is consistent with those machine counts.O'SULLIVAN: Bill and Stephen are both Republicans. They've been battling election conspiracy theories for years, even when they're tweeted by Elon Musk.

utterances.speaker: RICHER
utterances.sentences: I don't know. I guess you just caught me at the moment where I said I wanted to say something about this. And so the allegation was that you don't have to be a citizen to be able to vote in Arizona. You must be a citizen. It is unlawful. It is a felony if you vote and you are not a citizen. Your immigration process will become much, much, much, much, much more challenging.

utterances.speaker: GATES
utterances.sentences: Look, there are issues at the border. I don't dispute that, but as it relates to voting it's not something that I'm concerned about. And this is unfortunately just another conspiracy theory that's now being thrown at the American people. So that those who maybe don't like where the final results end up will then point to that and say, well, that's why I didn't win.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: That's my guy. I've been looking everywhere for you, CNN guys.O'SULLIVAN: I spent a lot of time with Lindell recently. I will say we've had a lot of laughs together. He is an entertaining man. But what Mike Lindell is doing is dangerous, right?

utterances.speaker: GATES
utterances.sentences: I think anyone who is spreading misinformation about our election system, it's dangerous. Not only is it further rattling people's faith in the system, but in some instances, it leads to threats to our elections workers.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: What happens if they steal the election in November?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: I honestly think there might be a civil war in our country.O'SULLIVAN (voice-over): Through FrankSpeech --

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: The answer is people have to put this into their own hands.O'SULLIVAN: Mike has helped create a dangerous myth that a Trump loss in November can only come about through cheating. And the world for a serial election deniers like Rudy Giuliani have their own show. Since your question, because I've been thinking about this a lot, you're addicted to this?

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: No. No, I'm not addicted to this. You know what? I want every time, every place I go we have one shot to get rid of these electronic voting machines and get to paper ballots. I'm passionate about it because if you knew what I knew you wouldn't stop me either. O'SULLIVANprobably pretty dangerous.

utterances.speaker: LINDELL
utterances.sentences: OK. But I don't agree with that. Why is that dangerous that I want to have secure elections? Tell me that. Why -- how you come --O'SULLIVAN: You're supporting, right, you have helped build the universe through FrankSpeech and Frank Social.
